posts.title: The Grand Egyptian Museum
posts.body: The Grand Egyptian Museum, located near the Giza Pyramids, is set to become the largest archaeological museum in the world. It houses thousands of ancient artifacts, including the full collection of King Tutankhamun’s treasures.

posts.title: Koshari
posts.body:
Koshari is one of Egypt’s most iconic dishes — a delicious mix of rice, pasta, lentils, chickpeas, and crispy fried onions, topped with a spicy tomato sauce and garlic vinegar.

It’s a meal that tells a story of Egypt’s culture — simple, flavorful, and made for everyone. You can find Koshari everywhere, from small street carts to famous restaurants, bringing people together with every bite! 🇪🇬❤️

posts.title: اللي يعيش ياما يشوف
posts.body: This famous Egyptian saying means 'He who lives, sees a lot.' It reminds us that life is full of unexpected events and experiences, and the more we live, the more we learn. It's a proverb that encourages patience and curiosity about the world around us.
